name: gimghm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1o(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1o(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1o(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))))

stmt.origin: isgim(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)), wf1o(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c2))))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(c1[GrpIso]c2)↔(c0 ∈(c1[GrpHom]c2)∧(c0 :(Base ` c1)↔(Base ` c2))))
⊣ (Base ` c1)=(Base ` c1)
⊣ (Base ` c2)=(Base ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))

|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c2), cfv(cbs, c2))
|- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cgim, c2)), wcel(c0, co(c1, cghm, c2)))

comment: An isomorphism of groups is a homomorphism. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Jan-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-May-2015.)
